name: hm08
effect: Teaches Rock Climb to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches a move to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Rock Climb Gen III: Dive)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Dives underwater
the 1st turn, then
attacks next turn.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Dives underwater
the 1st turn, then
attacks next turn.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user dives
underwater on the
first turn and
strikes next turn.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A charging attack that may also leave
the foe confused. It can also be used
to scale rocky walls.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A charging attack that may also leave
the foe confused. It can also be used
to scale rocky walls.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A charging attack that may also leave
the foe confused. It can also be used
to scale rocky walls.
